name: as3-to-typescript
description: convert as3 code base to typescript

scripts.test: node test/runner generate && node test/runner compare
scripts.compile: tsc --module commonjs --outDir lib --target es5 src/main/parser.ts src/main/emitter.ts src/main/command.ts src/main/aoqiH5PreHandle.ts src/main/AoqiH5AfterHandle.ts
scripts.watch: tsc --module commonjs --outDir lib --target es5 src/main/parser.ts src/main/emitter.ts src/main/command.ts src/main/aoqiH5PreHandle.ts src/main/AoqiH5AfterHandle.ts

author: Fran√ßois de Campredon <francois.de.campredon@gmail.com>
